籤詩版本二:
Ua kiola ʻo ia iā ia iho i loko o ka puka torii i kālai ʻia ma lalo o ka pōhaku e hoʻihoʻi i ke kanaka.
ʻO wai ka mea hiki ke loaʻa inā hoʻolālā koke ʻoe ʻAʻohe mea hiki ke hele i ka honua.
詩意:
Hoʻolei kēia hexagram i ke kiʻi o ka manu keleawe ma luna o ka pōhaku.
He hōʻailona o ka pōmaikaʻi i nā mea a pau.
解曰: E ʻai me ka iʻa ʻole. He ʻilihune ka noho maʻemaʻe a hauʻoli. E kali iā Tetra Pak. Ka mana a me nā kānaka.
籤詩故事一:
◇ ʻO ka lokomaikaʻi e hālāwai me ka Haku
I ka moʻokūʻauhau ʻo Tang, ua hānau ʻia ʻo Xue Li (614-683), ʻo Rengui ka inoa mahalo, ma Longmen, Jiangzhou (ʻo Hejin, Shanxi i kēia manawa).
Ua komo ʻo Xue Rengui i ka pūʻali koa ʻekolu manawa, e lawelawe ana ma ke ʻano he koa meaʻai wale nō.
I ka wā i alualu ʻia ai ʻo Emperor Taizong (Li Shimin) o ka mōʻī Tang e Gaisu, ua pilikia ʻo ia a ua hoʻopakele ʻia e Rengui.
ʻO ia hoʻi, ua kapa ʻia ʻo ia i mākaʻi e Emperor Taizong o ka mōʻī Tang, alakaʻi i nā pūʻali i ka hikina, a ua hoʻokō i nā hana koa he nui.
聖意: He maikai ole ka hale ia ia iho, he pomaikai, he pomaikai, he pomaikai, he paakiki ka loaa ana o ka waiwai, he paakiki ke kuai, he mea maa ia ka mare, ua palekana o Liujia, Aia na kanaka kokoke i ke kula, na enuhe silika. kanu mua ia, eono holoholona i poino, nalo na kanaka, pono na hoopii aupuni, maikai ka hele ana, maikai ka waiwai nalowale, loaa na mai, hoouna i ka lua kupapau mauna.
古人: Ua hui ʻo Rengui me ka Haku
第X籤: ʻO ke ono o ka hailona
